sentence.Network_en: She said snappishly. "I'm not pregnant, Brian."
sentence.Network_cn: 她没好气地说：“布赖恩，我没有怀孕。”

sentence.Network_en: His mild inquiries were answered snappishly and in a manner not to the point.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那些温和的问题所得到的答复是暴跳如雷,而且驴头不对马嘴.

list.abs: said the young Crab , a little snappishly ., 小螃蟹耐着小脾气说.
reply slowly 慢条斯理地回答reply snappishly 辛辣地回答reply solemnly 庄严地回答

entry.tran: (对人说话的方式)恶狠狠的，疾言厉色的，发急的
entry.def: If someone is snappish, they speak to people in a sharp, unfriendly manner.

example.ex: 'That is beautiful, Tony,' Momma said, no longer sounding at all snappish.
example.tran: “真美呀，托尼，”妈妈说道，话音里的恶声恶气不见了。

means.word_mean: 1. in an ill-natured and snappish manner;

sentences.sentence: "`Don't talk to me now,' she said snappishly"

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
